name: Coin Simulator 2: Pet Paradise Island
description:
Welcome to the Sequel to Coin Simulator. Basically the same as last game except a bit different as well.

Use arrow keys to move. Click on coins and gems to collect them. Click the arrow to go to a different area.

Different pets in the game have different borders in the pet equip menu. 

Circle = Returning from Coin Simulator 1

Diamond = Newcomer in Coin Simulator 2

Now Backgrounds for the borders

Space = Released in Coin Simulator 1: Release Date

Desert (Yellow) = Released in Coin Simulator 1: Phoenix Attacks

Dark = Released in Coin Simulator 1: Memes or released in Coin Simulator 2

Dark Red = Halloween event pets
